message: Nice, I'd suggest the you add your link to the "StartupList" group (https://convore.com/startuplist/) as well. Your startup could be featured on StartupLi.st :)
thank you for the suggestion Nick - we'll do that!
hello all, can i promote websites over here?
if the websites are for killer startups, yes!
New app launching soon in NYC looking for early adopters with digital content: http://igobubble.com/content
Seems cool also if I don't know how a public tweet can be secret... Can you tell me?
Like the video, like the idea. But maybe make it more obvious (like "Perishable conversation history" - but catchier! below the video) what the product is without making me watch a video.
The video is very well done...

Please review our website at http://www.igobubble.com  Is the website and video effective? igobubble lets you use your phone to leave photos, videos and messages inside living bubbles wherever you go. After you leave, your bubbles stay behind. Bubbles with an Attitude! They grow with interaction and shrink with negligence. Popular bubbles grow, divide, multiply and spread. Unpopular bubbles shrink, wither and pop. Feedback highly appreciated. Applying for TC Disrupt in Sept. Available for free on iPhone App Store.
I might have posted in wrong list. Sorry, not intended.
